channel.title: [317] request
channel.description: okay, I'm looking for a "good" 317 supported client. I don't care about the sprites. any type will work, because I'm just gonna change them up.. I was looking through the dl list by lin(thanks, for adding those btw) to find a "good" 317 client. but no offense to those who make them(I'm not good at making them), but they aren't "good" enough.. I'm looking to make a server, but I haven't been able to get a client that would actually work good with it.. ALSO, every one I've tried.. it works for ME, but NO BODY else! wtf?? I did literally EVERYTHING that they have in tutorials on how to get it up on the air.. and it doesn't work.. I have no-ip, i port fowarded.. set the stuff on the client and server.. and it doesn't work!

item.title: [317] request
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:4, topic:292021”][quote author=gamerbug link=topic=385850.msg2894067#msg2894067 date=1249090529]

Wrong section + no requests.
Learn to use the search bar.

yeah uhm, this is not the wrong section, no rule says NO REQUESTS, and I did use search… i might’ve forgot to mention that, but uhh, I DID mention I looked in the DOWNLOAD LIST!
[/quote]KID YOU CAN’T FUCKING REQUEST, WANT ME TO GET A MOD HERE?
So shut the fuck up, either look again or make one.[/quote]
go ahead and get one… nothing in the rules on this section says NO REQUESTS…

Read full topic
